channel.title: D claw [pi] small error
channel.description:
ok so ive tried adding d claws whit this tut:http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/407646-pi-adding-dragon-claws-client-side.html
when i compile i get this error:
ItemDef_2.java:770: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 1 error Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

item.title: D claw [pi] small error
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote="…nerd123456789, post:7, topic:452111"]ItemDef_2.java:745: error: cannot find symbol
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
^
symbol: variable actions
location: variable itemDef of type ItemDef
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/quote]
Replace

itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield";

To

itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield";

Read full topic

^

^

item.title: D claw [pi] small error
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

replace

if(i == 14484) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165 itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt200 itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); } return itemDef; }

with

case 14484: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165 itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt200 itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); break;
